name: Debt Jumper
description:
Hello World!

This is my first attempt at creating a platforming game with Construct 3. This is currently a prototype, but I intend to keep updating the game over the next few months and potentially onwards. 

Things to know ---
- Currently Unfinished: There is currently no way to actually beat the game. Reaching level five will allow the player to loop back to level one so you can play the game again. 

- I do not expect you to reach the goal of 6,000 points: Reaching the end goal of "$6,000" would be an arduous task that I do not expect you to actually achieve. I do however challenge anyone with that kind of free time to go for it.

Feel free to play the game as much as you want for free, but if can spare a dime (or 20) its greatly appreciated and you'll be supporting a dream. 

I hope you enjoy, and I look forward to updating this content as I continue my development journey!

Assets Used:

  • Sky background | OpenGameArt.org Paul Riva
  • country field | OpenGameArt.org Sam
  • Pixel House and Fence | OpenGameArt.org www.instagram.com/fethalis\
  • Mini Pack - Money | OpenGameArt.org photoshopwizard
  • Lunchbox SVG | OpenGameArt.org Jordan Irwin (AntumDeluge)
